extras.value:
Talos is a warrior. He is strong and agile with good leadership skills and an inspiring way with his comrades, not to mention the ladies. 
While serving as a marine, Talos honed his combat skills, engaged in stealth operations, learned a magic trick to survive hostile climates, and became familiarwith electrotech gear.
Combat Focus	Electrotech	Heroic Mien	Rapid Attack	Resist Energy	Seafarer	Vitality Surge	Weapon Focus
